title: Cleanse so under rated
body: How come no one ever uses it? I always prefer cleanse over ignite when vsing an Irelia or Riven top, it helps so much when they cant stun n insta nuke you :D

replies.body: depends on ur team. If they can beat cc then no need. IF not then get it
cleanse is terrible on top laners
Yeah it's good for comps with alot of possible cc
